name: CC26xx Bluetooth Smart

core.message: This package can only be made offline in its entirety.

description:
Quicken your development time with CC26xx Bluetooth Smart package, a tool for navigating the available resources that support CC2650 devices. Using this GUI or clicking through the folder tree to the left, we offer code examples, documentation and other resources - all at the tip of your fingers

See TI Bluetooth / Bluetooth Low Energy Solutions and BLE Wiki for more information

BLE E2E Forum
